metadata.title: CVE-2023-52339 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In libebml before 1.4.5, an integer overflow in MemIOCallback.cpp can occurwhen reading or writing. It may result in buffer overflows.

criterions.comment: libebml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
